Reviews.Title: still a workhorse laptop
Reviews.Author: R. Wagoner "rwagoner"
Reviews.Content: I've been using the Precision M70 for the last three years and I still think it outperforms most of the new laptops that I've worked on. It is a tough, well constructed latop that is great for everyday work. The video card which seperated this model from other Dells of its time is very good and better than most stock videos on new laptops.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: Illyich
Reviews.Content: This computer was purchased to replace a newer machine the had failed and has been a fine replacement. After adding the battery that the seller said was missing I have been very pleased with the performance of it. Though it is a used machine, it was in nearly new condition and has worked well, even accepting a 2GB memory upgrade from the failed machine it replaced. with that addition it has been able to run Windows 7 without fault. This is how a purchase should be, honest and easy. If this seller has another machine offered, buy it, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Amazon, a good used computer purchase
Reviews.Author: david schaedler
Reviews.Content: A computer is a computer, and this one matches that expectation. Hoever, the screen size (15.2" vs 14") makes a definite difference to that - less than store cost. It's a good bye.

Reviews.Title: Dell laptop
Reviews.Author: Darlene Lord
Reviews.Content: The Dell laptop I ordered  was perfect for my son - he stays on it all the time!!!  I need to see about getting another one for myself!

Reviews.Title: very nice laptop
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with this laptop for the price. it kicks I highly recommend tampa laptops and amazon for a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Obsolete
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: I kow very little about computers. So I took a two day computer class and  I found out that you need windows to use Microsoft word. This computer used to use Windows XP but that is obsolete so they changed it to Ubuntu, so it doesn't use the most common system.  When I tried to use it the battery was dead and would't take a charge. So I bought another battery, but they don't make new ones anymore so it was shot too. I'm sorry I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Dell M70 computer
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Walton
Reviews.Content: This Dell computer was returned because none of the components worked. Before it was sent, it should have been tested and, obviously, it was not.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: mick
Reviews.Content: Work for a very short time very very slow know I have to look for a new hard drive it was a very old computer

Reviews.Title: Crashes
Reviews.Author: EDDIE MORALES
Reviews.Content: The laptop crashes alot and has to be repaired. It will cost more to fix it then I paid to own it.

Reviews.Title: Like Dell computers
Reviews.Author: Donna Comstock
Reviews.Content: This machine was really a good machine, but after using it 20 minutes or so, and it built up the heat enough to turn on the cooling fans, they were just too noisy, especially the largest one. That does not take away the Dell quality, but had to send it back for Fan replacements.  Hopefully after it is fixed, we will receive it back.
